page.title: 13TRAFFIC SURVEY A616,KNEESALL
page.content: It was a cold chilly Wednesday in May. We were doing a traffic survey.There were four of us taking it in hourly shifts,two at a time, one group counting the traffic Newark to Ollerton and the other group counting the opposite way.Here is a list of the traffic we counted. Ollerton to Newark. 9:00a.m 10:00am we counted,69 cars,49 lorries,3 coaches,9 vans and 7 farm vehicles.The total for the hour was 137 Vehicles 10:00am _ 11:00am we counted,76 cars,34 lorries,13 vans and four farm vehicles.The total for the hour was 127 vehicles 11:00am _ 12:00pm we counted,59 cars,27 lorries,6 vans,2 buses,2 push bikes and 3 farm vehicles.The total count was 99 vehicles.
